composition_rules.focus: Shoes occupy ~65% of frame; crisp edges and texture; platform sole highlighted by angle and lighting; no other objects.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Keep headline on clean background area; ensure outline/contrast; badges not overlapping shoes; all text within 10% safe margin.

prompts.negative_prompt: Logos/branding of any kind, watermarks, people or faces, lifestyle scenes, street backgrounds, clutter, additional footwear models, colored shoes, metallic/glossy patent look, exaggerated platform height, fake stitching details, text artifacts, unreadable typography, price/discount claims, claims about being 'original' of other brands, measurements in cm, medical/comfort guarantees not provided.

prompts.prompt: Create a bold, high-conversion split-background thumbnail (1080x1080). composition_rules.focus: Sneakers are the largest and sharpest element; strong contrast against split background; platform sole clearly visible; no distractions.
composition_rules.text_legibility: Place text only on the clean white half; maintain safe margins; ensure sufficient contrast and spacing between headline and badges.

prompts.negative_prompt: Any brand logos, trademark patterns, watermarks, people/faces/hands, busy textures, additional products, colored accents on shoes, dirty or worn shoes, over-stylized CGI, extreme perspective distortion, lens flare, unreadable or extra text beyond overlays, price/discount stickers, claims about durability or measurements not provided, copyrighted characters.
